name: Shadows (itch) (CognizantGameStudios)
description: You find yourself in the ancient ruins of Miyahata, in Fukushima Japan, a quick sightsee during your business trip turns sinister after discovering how the Fukushima disaster has affected the ancient spirits of Miyahata. Keep your light on, or you may not make it out a live. Discover the history of the land and what happened here. Good luck.
